Original:
Here I am, finally!

走進HI NE NI，我立刻被其摩登復古的氛圍所吸引。無論選擇坐在挑高的空間或特色的包廂，只要手中有杯精心調製的雞尾酒，工作一天的疲勞立刻煙消雲散。

Negroni這款經典的意大利開胃調酒在此得到了新生，搭配濃郁鮮甜的慢燉洋蔥湯可謂相得益彰。

Hi-Pop Sour很值得酒客嚐鮮，各派茶酒匠心獨具，在這我體會到了琴酒尾韻與抹茶香回甘的平衡，再嚐一口油封鴨腿特別爽口。

我以Milk & Honey作結，嘴饞來點玉米片，香氣層次豐富又別具存在感，結完帳也能回味再三。
EN:
Here I am, finally!

Entering Hi Ne Ni, I was immediately attracted by its modern retro atmosphere.Regardless of whether to sit in a high space or characteristic box, as long as you have a cup of cocktails carefully prepared in your hands, the fatigue of work will disappear immediately.

Negroni's classic Italian appetizer and bartender have been new here. With the rich and sweet slow -stewed onion soup, it can be described as complementary.

The Hi-Pop Sour is worthy of drinking. Each tea wine is unique. Here I have experienced the balance between the tail rhyme and the matcha fragrance back.

I made Milk & Honey, and my mouth was some corn slices. The aroma level was rich and unique.

Original:
HI NE NI酒吧是我最近發現的一個真正令人印象深刻的地方。它的空間環境絕對令人驚艷。從你踏進這家酒吧的那一刻起，你就會感受到一種獨特的氛圍。酒吧的設計充滿了現代感和藝術感，融合了木質元素和金屬細節，營造出一種極具吸引力的氛圍。無論你喜歡坐在吧台邊品味美酒，還是在舒適的沙發上放鬆身心，這裡都能滿足你的需要。

此外，HI NE NI酒吧的氛圍也是其獨特之處。音樂輕快而時尚，但不會過於吵雜，讓你可以與朋友們暢所欲言，同時也能感受到一種放鬆的氛圍。員工服務也非常出色，他們總是以微笑和熱情的態度迎接客人，讓你感受到家的溫暖。

總的來說，HI NE NI酒吧給人的印象是一個非常值得一遊的地方。它的空間環境和氛圍絕對會讓你流連忘返，無論是與朋友一起度過愉快的時光，還是獨自來此放鬆，都會讓你感受到一種獨特的魅力。
EN:
The Hi Ne Ni bar is a truly impressive place I have recently discovered.Its space environment is absolutely amazing.From the moment you step into this bar, you will feel a unique atmosphere.The design of the bar is full of modernity and artistic sense, combining wooden elements and metal details, creating a very attractive atmosphere.Whether you like to sit on the bar on the bar, or relax your body and mind on a comfortable sofa, you can meet your needs here.

In addition, the atmosphere of the Hi Ne Ni bar is also unique.The music is brisk and fashionable, but it will not be too noisy, so that you can speak with your friends, and at the same time you can feel a relaxed atmosphere.The employee service is also very good. They always meet the guests with a smile and enthusiasm, so that you can feel the warmth of the home.

Overall, the Hi Ne Ni bar gives people a very worthwhile place.Its space environment and atmosphere will definitely make you linger. Whether you have a pleasant time with your friends or relaxing here alone, you will feel a unique charm.
